title: Kansas Lakes & Reservoirs (USACE/KDHE/USGS)
description: Polygons for major Kansas lakes and reservoirs (USACE-operated and state-managed), including attributes for construction year, capacity, and controlling agency. Useful for pre/post-dam river-course comparisons and flood history.

endpoints.notes: USACE lake boundaries & metadata; KDHE/KS GIS hub polygons; optional cross-check with NHD waterbodies.

steps: Collect USACE reservoir boundaries and attributes (construction year, agency, capacity)
Merge with KDHE/Kansas GIS hub lake/reservoir polygons
Cross-check/normalize with NHD Waterbody polygons (resolve duplicates/mismatches)
Add derived fields: pre_dam_river (if known), water_supply (Y/N), hydropower (Y/N)
commands_example: python scripts/hydro_merge_lakes.py lakes_usace.json lakes_kansas.json lakes_nhd.json -o lakes_reservoirs_ks.json

lineage: USACE reservoir boundaries (authoritative for federal projects)
USGS NHD Waterbody for geometry QC
notes: Populate construction_year & agency where available to enable timeline toggling (pre/post impoundment analyses).
